TEXT.TITLE: ENERGAS <EGAS.O> TO BUY TEXAS AMERICAN <TAE>UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Energas Co said it has agreed in principle to purchase Western Kentucky Gas Co from Texas American Energy Corp for 61.5 mln dlrs in cash plus assumptrion of certain liabilities. Western Kentucky is a gas distribution company which serves about 143,000 customers in 108 towns and communities in Kentucky. Reuter
